live_updates: Our technicians have been able to restore service to more than half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50211.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of New Westminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50211.title: June 1 - New Westminster (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
